title: SPG diam 52 mm, scale 360 bar, working pressure 300 bar, black PVD coating - head only Military Line

photos.alt: Manometr TecLine 52 mm, skala 360 bar, ciśnienie robocze 300 bar, pokrycie czarne PVD - głowica Military Line

description:
Product description

Tecline Military is a range of Tecline equipment designed according to the specifications of the orders for Special Forces.
The availability of Tecline Military products depends on the amount of production surpluses.

 

Pressure gauge from the Military Line

Black head with black dial
For OC and CCR applications
Diameter 52mm
Working pressure 300bar
Scale up to 360bar
Made of stainless steel with PVD* coating
Emergency pressure plug
Tempered glass

 

Pressure gauge prepared for "Military" configuration.
Made of high quality stainless steel with a special very hard PVD coating. Head and dial in black. Can be used in any equipment configuration. The head protected by a pressure safety plug prevents the glass from exploding in case of failure. Equipped with tempered glass.

*PVD - Reactive Arc Ion Plating technology of applying very hard coatings. This method is used, for example, to harden tools of very high strength.
